column3:
@Sjors 
Thank you for your review.

> I'm confused: why would you remove the debug window menu item?

In the node mode:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/fa7e9694e1ed5406036620d4bf0b72a2aa984578/src/qt/bitcoingui.cpp#L114-L117

and
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/fa7e9694e1ed5406036620d4bf0b72a2aa984578/src/qt/bitcoingui.cpp#L343

effectively disable this slot:

All thoughts above are implemented.

Master [wallet mode]
![tray_wallet_before](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/46564983-c9ae3900-c913-11e8-901a-66690f97e3b2.png)

This PR [wallet mode]
![tray_wallet_after2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/46565132-2d853180-c915-11e8-858b-29aa8111f78e.png)

Master [node mode]
![tray_node_before](https://user-
Don't forget to install `clang-format` and run the https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/master/contrib/devtools#clang-format-diffpy script to preempt whitespace nitpicking.
I would prefer `if (enableWallet)` as well. Using `walletFrame` seems to be an older convention: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/b7f4b6d35da7b63529a728eb9333fe424b2a5c6d
